verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> [Tmas-KilMaschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David בְּב֤וֹא׀ <S%H935><s%> be-Vo came דּוֹאֵ֣ג <S%H1673><s%> do-'Eg when Doeg הָאֲדֹמִי֮ <S%H130><s%> ha-'a-do-Mi the Edomite וַיַּגֵּ֪ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged and told לְשָׁ֫א֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> le-Sha-'Ul Saul וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said ל֑וֹ lo; בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ba is come דָ֝וִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, unto him David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit to the house אֲחִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H288><s%> 'a-chi-Me-lech. of Ahimelech מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- Why תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> tit-hal-Lel Why boastest בְּ֭רָעָה <S%H7451><s%> Be-ra-'ah thou thyself in mischief הַגִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-Bor; O mighty חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed man;the goodness אֵ֝֗ל <S%H410><s%> 'El, of God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. [endureth] continually

הַ֭וּוֹת <S%H1942><s%> Hav-Vot mischiefs תַּחְשֹׁ֣ב <S%H2803><s%> tach-Sho deviseth לְשׁוֹנֶ֑ךָ <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Ne-cha; Thy tongue כְּתַ֥עַר <S%H8593><s%> ke-Ta-'ar razor מְ֝לֻטָּ֗שׁ <S%H3913><s%> me-lut-Tash, like a sharp עֹשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh working רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> re-mi-Yah. deceitfully

אָהַ֣בְתָּ <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hav-ta Thou lovest רָּ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' evil מִטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> mit-Tov; more than good שֶׁ֓קֶר׀ <S%H8267><s%> She-ker [and] lying מִדַּבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> mid-dab-Ber rather than to speak צֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek righteousness סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אָהַ֥בְתָּ <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hav-ta Thou lovest כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> div-rei- words בָ֗לַע <S%H1105><s%> Va-la', all devouring לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> le-Shon tongue מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> mir-Mah. O [thou] deceitful

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- But אֵל֮ <S%H410><s%> 'el God יִתָּצְךָ֪ <S%H5422><s%> yit-ta-tze-Cha shall likewise destroy לָ֫נֶ֥צַח <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach thee for ever יַחְתְּךָ֣ <S%H2846><s%> yach-te-Cha he shall take thee away וְיִסָּחֲךָ֣ <S%H5255><s%> ve-yis-sa-cha-Cha and pluck thee out מֵאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> me-'O-hel; of [thy] dwelling place וְשֵֽׁרֶשְׁךָ֨ <S%H8327><s%> ve-she-resh-Cha and root thee out מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim of the living סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

וְיִרְא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> ve-yir-'U also shall see צַדִּיקִ֥ים <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim The righteous וְיִירָ֗אוּ <S%H3372><s%> ve-yi-Ra-'u, and fear וְעָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> ve-'a-Lav and יִשְׂחָֽקוּ׃ <S%H7832><s%> yis-Cha-ku. and shall laugh

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold הַגֶּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> hag-Ge-ver, Lo [this is] the man לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> ya-Sim [that] made אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, not God מָֽע֫וּזּ֥וֹ <S%H4581><s%> ma-'Uz-Zo his strength וַ֭יִּבְטַח <S%H982><s%> Vai-yiv-tach but trusted בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> be-Ro in the abundance עָשְׁר֑וֹ <S%H6239><s%> a-she-Ro; of his riches יָ֝עֹ֗ז <S%H5810><s%> ya-'Oz, [and] strengthened בְּהַוָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1942><s%> be-hav-va-To. himself in his wickedness

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I כְּזַ֣יִת <S%H2132><s%> ke-Za-yit olive tree רַ֭עֲנָן <S%H7488><s%> Ra-'a-non But I [am] like a green בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; of God בָּטַ֥חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> ba-Tach-ti I trust בְחֶֽסֶד־ <S%H2617><s%> ve-che-sed- in the mercy אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God עוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed. and ever

אוֹדְךָ֣ <S%H3034><s%> 'od-Cha I will praise לְ֭עוֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> Le-'o-lom thee for ever כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta; because thou hast done וַאֲקַוֶּ֖ה <S%H6960><s%> va-'a-kav-Veh [it] and I will wait שִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha on thy name כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> chi- because ט֝֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov, for [it is] good נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged the presence חֲסִידֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dei-cha. before thy saints
